message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $110. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I see you're interested, and I want to make a deal.  How about we settle at $100?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle at $95?
